description: This house-sized townhome at McCartney Lane truly has it all! NOT facing Mt Seymour Pkwy.  4 bdrms/4 bath over 2,000 sq.ft, + 2 parking. Incredible value in one of North Van's favourite communities. The open concept kitchen features new appliances, charming garden window + eating/family area opening to a partly covered patio—perfect for year-round enjoyment. The main level offers a cozy fireplace + living/dining area built for gatherings and good conversation. Upstairs features 3 bdrms...the king-sized primary suite with walk-in closet & en-suite bath feels like a private retreat!  The lower level adds a 4th bdrm, full bath + spacious rec room—ideal for kids, teens, or home office needs.  Pet friendly complex on a bike route in a wonderful area!
